snippet.title: Neon City - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch as a colorful city is created in this trailer for Neon City, an upcoming virtual reality city-building game, revealed during the Advanced Games Projects (AGP) Spotlight Show at USC Games Expo 2023. Neon City is coming to the Oculus Rift Store.

Neon City combines the charm of block toys with cutting-edge hand-tracking technology. Create and explore your own digital city in 360 degrees with a unique retro-inspired art style, with the added bonus of experiencing your unique metropolis in 1:1 scale.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
